Name: Topfold
About the game: This is a classic tetris game from a different angle. You see the playing field from above and the pieces fall down from you. In addition to rotating the figures along the x and y axes, you can use the z axis as well. As expected, the shapes differ in color. Features: - Pleasant special effects and shadows. - A challenging logic puzzle. - Ease of understanding the gameplay.
